response.answer_text: We would have to wait for a month or two to see all the dirt on both sides and how will the voters react on those allegations ,then we can tell how would the election go. Trump has lot of dirt on Biden and he still haven’t revealed on the other side the Democrats and the MSM can fabricate more fake allegations like the Russian bounty and we don’t know the reaction of the voters although most voters are determine no matter what and they will stick with their candidate.

Most likely: 3 things will happen. This as the coronavirus pandemic death rate sky rockets in Trump country as these states struggle to contain the coronavirus from overwhelming their medical systems. As these states slow down their reopening, their unemployment rate will stay high. The Republicans especially in the Senate will drop Trump at a hat.Trump will loose at a landslideTrump will take the Republican Senate with him lol
